sentence.Network_en: You can see nebulae in the clear summer sky.
sentence.Network_cn: 在晴朗的夏夜可以看到天上的星云.

sentence.Network_en: The element hydrogen comprises 90 % of the matter in gaseous nebulae.
sentence.Network_cn: 元素氢占气体星云物质的百分之九十.

sentence.Network_en: Some nebulae appear to be completely engulfed by exceedingly large molecular clouds.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些气体星云似乎被极其巨大的分子云完全包围.

PerfectNetExp.abs: some nebulae appear to be completely engulfed by exceedingly large molecular clouds .有些气体星云似乎被极其巨大的分子云完全包围。
these sources are generally viewed in projection against radio nebulae representing the remnants of supernova outbursts .这类源一般都投影在超星爆发残骸的射电星云上。

list.abs: 暗星云（dark nebula ）是星际云（interstellar cloud）的一种，他的密度足以遮蔽来自背景的发射星云或反射星云的光（像是马头星云…
发射星云-发射星云(Emission nebula)是能辐射出各种不同色光的游离气体云(也就是所谓的等离子),造成游离的原因通常是来自邻近恒星幅射出来的高能量光子。这些不同的.
在这组用“巡天先进相机”拍到的照片中，“哈勃”太空望远镜于2005年初捕捉到“回力棒星云”(Boomerang Nebula)的分散光。这个反射的 …
... 2概述1999年12月哈勃遗产计划小组捕捉到这张猎户座反射星云NGC1999的照片,反射星云,reflection nebula,是靠反射和散射近旁的照亮星的光而变得明亮可见的星云,2010年所知HH天体是由非常年轻的恒星喷出的.

entry.def: A nebula is a cloud of dust and gas in space. New stars are produced from nebulae.

auth_sentence.content: Nebulae Beautiful dust and gas clouds are found in interstellar space.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nebulae Beautiful dust and gas clouds are found in interstellar space.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nebulae Beautiful dust and gas clouds are found in interstellar space.

auth_sentence.content: Each picture depicted a musical chord; they looked like star nebulae.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each picture depicted a musical chord; they looked like star nebulae.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Each picture depicted a musical chord; they looked like star nebulae.

auth_sentence.content: O'Dell has since been looking at the jets erupting from stars and how they interact with the ambient material in nebulae.
auth_sentence.res_content: O'Dell has since been looking at the jets erupting from stars and how they interact with the ambient material in nebulae.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: O'Dell has since been looking at the jets erupting from stars and how they interact with the ambient material in nebulae.
